jasperReport.name: ticket_report
jasperReport.queryString: SELECT t.ticketid, t.problem AS issue, t.location, t.assigned_date, t.est_resolution_date, t.cause, t.solution, t.resolution_date, t.entered, t.modified, t.closed, t.expectation, tp.description AS ticpri, ts.description AS ticsev, tc.description AS catname, o.account_number AS accountnumber, o.name AS customername, myorg.name AS myorgname, c.contact_id, c.namefirst AS firstname, c.namelast AS lastname, c.title, lu_ts.description AS sourcename, sc.contract_number AS contractnumber, a.serial_number AS serialnumber, ctent.namefirst AS enteredbyfirstname, ctent.namelast AS enteredbylastname, ctmod.namefirst AS modifiedbyfirstname, ctmod.namelast AS modifiedbylastname, ctassg.namelast AS assglastname, ctassg.namefirst AS assgfirstname, ld.description AS dept FROM organization myorg, ticket t LEFT JOIN ticket_priority tp ON (t.pri_code = tp.code) LEFT JOIN ticket_severity ts ON (t.scode = ts.code) LEFT JOIN ticket_category tc ON (t.cat_code = tc.id) LEFT JOIN organization o ON (t.org_id = o.org_id) LEFT JOIN contact c ON (t.contact_id = c.contact_id) LEFT JOIN lookup_ticketsource lu_ts ON (t.source_code = lu_ts.code) LEFT JOIN service_contract sc ON (t.link_contract_id = sc.contract_id) LEFT JOIN asset a ON (t.link_asset_id = a.asset_id) LEFT JOIN access ent ON (t.enteredby = ent.user_id) LEFT JOIN contact ctent ON (ent.contact_id = ctent.contact_id) LEFT JOIN access mod ON (t.modifiedby = mod.user_id) LEFT JOIN contact ctmod ON (mod.contact_id = ctmod.contact_id) LEFT JOIN access assg ON (t.assigned_to = assg.user_id) LEFT JOIN contact ctassg ON (assg.contact_id = ctassg.contact_id) LEFT JOIN lookup_department ld ON (t.department_code = ld.code) WHERE myorg.org_id = 0 AND t.ticketid = $P{ticketid}

staticText.text: Have our services met or exceeded your expectations ?
